instruction.value: Instill into LEFT eye Q1H until desired response obtained.
Instill into LEFT eye Q2H until desired response obtained.
Instill into RIGHT eye Q1H until desired response obtained.
Instill into RIGHT eye Q2H until desired response obtained.
Instill into affected eye(s) Q1H until desired response obtained.
Instill into affected eye(s) Q2H until desired response obtained.
Instill into BOTH eyes Q1H until desired response obtained.
Instill into BOTH eyes Q2H until desired response obtained.
